title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Peter Parker's world is turned upside down when his identity as Spider-Man is revealed, forcing him to seek help from Doctor Strange. However, when a spell goes wrong, villains from other dimensions start to appear, threatening everything he holds dear.

title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
description: Doctor Strange teams up with Scarlet Witch to confront dark forces from parallel dimensions.

title: Thor: Love and Thunder
description: Thor teams up with Jane Foster, who transforms into the mighty Thor, to battle an ancient enemy.

title: The Marvels
description: Carol Danvers teams up with Kamala Khan and Monica Rambeau to face a new threat.

title: Fantastic Four
description: A team of scientists gains superpowers after being exposed to cosmic radiation and must use their newfound abilities to save the world.

title: Deadpool 3
description: Wade Wilson, aka Deadpool, embarks on a new adventure filled with action, humor, and pop culture references.

title: Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.
description: The Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement, and Logistics Division tackle global threats.
